verbose_text: As shown in Figures XREF_FIG A and XREF_FIG B, M2 conditioned medium significantly decreased apoptosis of neurons and increased viability of neurons subjected to OGD, while the addition of GW4869 (a small-molecule inhibitor that reduces exosomal secretion) in conditioned medium partly reversed the protective effect, suggesting that exosomes derived from M2 BV2 cells are involved in neuroprotection after OGD.
